name: cellspot1
description: Dark-themed telecom dashboard inspired by Alfa U-Share (Lebanon) with: - **Login/Signup** (Firebase Auth, Email/Password) - **Profile** (read/update first/last name; phone locked) - **Open/Closed Services** (packages, purchase modal) - **Add Credit** (upload proof to Storage; request to Firestore) - **Credit History & Order History** (filters, tables) - **Persistent sidebar** (collapsible; icons-only when collapsed) - **Dark mode** (localStorage)
